rating.label: Overall, how did you feel about the service you received today?

comments.para1: Do not include any personal or financial information, for example your National Insurance or credit card numbers.
comments.para2: The feedback you provide is anonymous and not part of your application.

errors.required: Select how satisfied you are before sending
errors.maxLength: Enter how we could improve this service in 1,200 characters or fewer (including spaces)

research: Volunteer to take part in research (opens in new tab) to help improve this service.
h2: How could we improve this service?
insetText: We will not respond to your feedback or use it when we process your claim.
